search.query: index=_internal source=*license_usage.log TERM(type=Usage) earliest=-7d@d latest=@d | fields idx, b, st, h, _time, date_wday | eval h=if(len(h)=0 OR isnull(h),"(SQUASHED)",h) | bin _time span=1d | stats sum(b) AS b, dc(h) AS h by st idx date_wday | stats avg(b) as avg_b, avg(h) AS Host_Count_per_Day by idx st | eval Avg_MB_per_Day=round(avg_b/1024/1024,2) | eval Avg_GB_per_Day=round(avg_b/1024/1024/1024,2) | eval Avg_MB_per_Host=round(Avg_MB_per_Day/Host_Count_per_Day,2) | eval Host_Count_per_Day=round(Host_Count_per_Day,0) | rename st AS Sourcetype | table idx, Sourcetype, Avg_MB_per_Day, Avg_GB_per_Day, Host_Count_per_Day, Avg_MB_per_Host | sort Sourcetype
